xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: pretty:namespace-decls
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: pretty:namespace-decls($elem as element(), $namespaces as xs:string*) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Check which namespace declarations have to be output.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: pretty:pretty-print
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: pretty:pretty-print($node as item(), $namespaces as xs:string*) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Pretty print an XML fragment. Returns HTML to highlight the XML syntax.
